￼We’re a niche, private client practice who focus on the legal protection of the vulnerable

"JE Bennett Law is a private client law firm which specialises in providing legal services to the vulnerable client. The vulnerable client can be someone of any age, injured at birth, or through disease/illness; as a result of clinical negligence or personal injury, or simply as a result of the ageing process. We pride ourselves on our holistic approach to our clients’ needs."

- Jane Bennett, Managing Director and Senior Partner

Our three areas of legal specialism:

Court of protection

Safeguarding the vulnerable adult and child including handling deprivation of liberty matters and trusts for the vulnerable.

Read more

Elderly client law

Including Enduring/Lasting Powers of Attorney; Wills, and advice regarding care in the home, or the community.

Read more

Expert witness service

Our standing in the field, means we also reguIarly provide expert witness services in relation to deputyship and personal injury trust vehicles arising from personal injury, clinical negligence or Criminal Injury Compensation Authority claims.

Read more

Working for the family of those
lacking mental capacity & the elderly
